faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: The questions I get asked most often

duration.question: How long does this stuff actually take?
duration.answer: Depends on what you need! A slick landing page? 2-3 weeks. A proper web app with backend, database, and all the bells and whistles? I'd plan for 2-4 months. Let's just chat quickly and I can give you a realistic estimate.

cost.question: What's this gonna cost me?
cost.answer: Honest answer: It depends big time on what you want. A clean website starts around €2,500, a proper app can run €15-25k. Sounds like a lot? But you're getting professional code that'll last for years. Just shoot me what you have in mind - I'll give you a fair quote.

technologies.question: What tech do you work with?
technologies.answer: I stick to what works and is future-proof: React & Next.js for websites (because they're simply fast), React Native for apps, TypeScript (so fewer bugs happen), and PostgreSQL for databases. No fancy stuff that nobody will know in 2 years.

maintenance.question: What happens after? You gonna leave me hanging?
maintenance.answer: Never! You get 3 months of free support - if something doesn't work or you have questions. After that, you can book a maintenance contract from €150/month. Or just call when something's up. I don't leave anyone alone with broken code.

process.question: How does it work? First time here...
process.answer: Super chill: We first talk about your idea (free, obviously). Then I make you an offer. If it fits, I start with design mockups so you see where we're heading. During development, you get regular updates. You're always in the loop, no surprises.

support.question: How fast do you reply?
support.answer: Within 24h, usually much faster. For urgent problems ("The website is down!") I'm also available by phone. I hate it myself when you wait days for answers - so I do it differently.

contact.title: More questions?
contact.description: Just shoot me a message! Happy to give you free advice.
